title: League of Legends is officially dead
body: Welcome to League of Scuttle Crab

replies.body:
Top: "Do you want me to TP for dragon?"

Jungler: "Nah, save TP for skuttle."
I was looking for some people overreacting to the latest patch. That wasn't hard :)
But are u quitting or just bs on forum?
What kind of games are you guys playing? I ain't had no one tp for some damn skuttle

LoL still has millions of players per day.

Quit, though. I am sure we will see you again soon.
I never said I want quit lol its a joke that the game isn't league of legends anymore butbits league of scuttle
